comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called ~ Siskiyou & Shasta County Scenery ~, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 7403112@N07
comment._content: Please add this picture & any other pictures of Northern California or taken by a Northern California photographer (any picture world wide) to: www.flickr.com/groups/1124231@N24/
